content.rendered:
beauty bar in gulfport | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar in gulfport, mississippi. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and special treatments for eyebrows and eyelashes. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #LikeATen®

booking soon

buy a series – coming soon
buy a membership – coming soon
newsletter sign-up – coming soon
beauty bar in gulfport | THE TEN SPOT®

  • 1107 Cowan Rd., Unit “E”
    Gulfport, Mississippi 39507

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

see services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

see services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

see services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

see services menu
booking soon!

Check out our awesome reviews!

Such a welcoming, fun experience - we braved taking our 3 yr old for her birthday and they made her feel so special and did a beautiful job on all our nails (me, my kid, and my husband). We’ll definitely be back!!
Brenna McGee
1717292772
Wonderful experience at the Edina Ten spot! I just had my second facial there today and couldn’t be happier. The esthetician was so sweet, thorough and provided me with 60 minutes of pure relaxation. She gave my face, shoulders and neck such a wonderful massage, I didn’t want it to end! My face is... still glowing and feels so soft and rejuvenated. I loved all the products she used. She gave me some helpful hints and I look forward to my next facial there! I recommend this beauty bar hands down!read more
Sarah Russell
1712715012
Very nice, clean, comfortable, bright and cheery salon. Easy attached indoor parking. The salon emphasizes clean sterilized equipment and conditions. Molly H gives a great pedicure! Very relaxing, and lots of attention to detail. I would recommend this salon and Molly for your nail services.
Nancy Meshbesher
1698371805
I booked here when my regular nail tech elsewhere was unavailable and I was in desperate need of a fresh set. I was able to get an appointment easily about three days ahead of time, although I’m sure high demand times might book out farther. Cute area, parking on a Sunday morning was easy. Everyone... was so nice, and Michelle did an amazing job on my nails! I get nervous going to new places for them due to bad experiences in the past, but she took her time meticulously making sure everything was just right and they look amazing! I had breakage that I was worried would mean losing all my length but she worked hard to blend it in so I could keep the tip of my middle finger. I got the BIAB gel overlay and my super thin nails feel secure and have a great polish job. So happy with my visit, def recommend and while I can’t cheat on my regular nail tech all the time you bet I’ll be back for my pedis!Polish is 1 coat cashmere, 1 coat “#bad@ss” lol, and a matte top coat!read more
Abby Holmquist
1697411922
Did a Google search on Pedicures to find a spot to get my first EVER pedicure. Came across this place, THE TEN SPOT, and very glad I did. Before I called, I looked through some reviews and found a lot of great ones that reassured me I was in the right spot. When I called to ask about services to... make sure I was going to get what I was looking for I was greeted with a lovely helpful voice, she was very pleasant and quickly helped me with any and all questions I had on their services. With all those good reviews I previously read I figured I’d be waiting a few days for an appointment as I could only do this mid afternoon to closing time, to my pleasant surprise they had an open spot for me that very afternoon.The shop was great, very bright and clean, I was a bit early for my appointment so I got to wait a bit and notice I was the only man hanging out in there, was just a bit nervous about scaring off all the beautiful ladies once I uncovered my caveman feet. Once they were ready for me, I took my seat on the raised bench area for them to work on me, there were already two customers being worked on as I sat between them, and I as removed my shoes and socks one pedicurist commented “Even men need some love.”, so NO ladies screaming and running for the door!!Michelle got the joy of working on my feet and she was super sweat with a big smile and very friendly, got the full treatment for a pedicure, feet couldn’t have been too bad as she didn’t have to break out the electric grinder for my nails. It was a very enjoyable experience and felt excellent, foot soaking, cuticle work, nails cut and sanded properly, excellent foot massage, my feet have never been so presentable and soft, she even put some clear polish for strengthening nails on my toenails.I will for sure be bringing my caveman feet back to Michelle, who knows might add just a bit of color next time, and I think I’ll add some work on my caveman hands too. You can’t go wrong hitting THE TEN SPOT and Michelle for your caveman foot needs!!Thank you all for the “Love”, Andrew7/14/23Got my second Peti, and as expected all was great, and this time got some new paint to go with my buffed up toes and feet. All the ladies there are awesome and I think they enjoyed making my toes pretty..read more
Andrew
1689448245
‹
›
